title: The Mythic and the Horses of Doom
description: In The Mythic Lucy Knight saved two worlds, so she's due for a rest, right? Wrong! Someone has awakened the Horses of Doom, and those perilous ponies won't stop until our world has been destroyed! Also, who is the mysterious group that appears in Hearth searching for Lucy?The Mythic and the Horses of Doom is a smartly irreverent action-fantasy in which Lucy Knight will face her biggest challenge yet: falling in love.The Mythic and the Horses of Doom is the second book in The Mythic series. The first installment is The Mythic. The third book, The Mythic and the City of Sweet Sorrow, is coming in 2013.
author: D.C. Sheehan
